path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Marshmallow Defi Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The updateEmissionRate function can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward mashReward in function updatePool will be incorrect.
